charges.charge_description: 18:1001 STATEMENTS OR ENTRIES GENERALLY: WILLINGLY AND KNOWINGLY MADE A MATERIALLY FALSE STATEMENT IN AN APPLICATION FOR A PASSPORT WITH INTENT TO INDUCE AND SECURE THE ISSUANCE OF A PASSPORT FOR HIS OWN USE UNDER THE AUTHORITY OF THE UNITED STATES, CONTRARY TO THE LAWS REGULATING THE ISSUANCE OF PASSPORTS AND THE RULES PRESCRIBED PURSUANT TO SUCH LAWS, IN THAT HE, AMONG OTHER THINGS, FALSELY STATED ON THE APPLICATION THAT HE WAS BORN IN THE UNITED STATES VIRGIN ISLANDS (1)
